title: Nook Palace
description: A quiet cozy space perfect for deep focus sessions with great lighting and comfy seating.

title: Skyline Lounge
description: Rooftop lounge with breathtaking skyline views for intimate gatherings or launches.

title: Green Garden Hall
description: Indoor-outdoor garden hall great for socials, workshops, and small ceremonies.

title: Brickhouse Studio
description: Industrial studio with brick walls and movable furniture for photo or creator meetups.

title: Seaside Pavilion
description: Open pavilion by the beach—fresh breeze and lots of natural light.

title: Art Loft
description: Minimal loft with white walls and track lights perfect for pop-ups and exhibits.

title: Woodland Cabin
description: Cozy cabin surrounded by trees—ideal for retreats and team building.

title: Tech Hub Room
description: Modern meeting room with dual displays and whiteboards for workshops.

title: Courtyard Commons
description: Airy courtyard with plants and string lights for chill gatherings.

title: The Glass Room
description: All-glass walls for a bright, premium feel—great for launches and briefings.
